00143 template <class Base>
00144 inline const iview::IColorShema& TViewImpl<Base>::GetDefaultColorShema() const
00145 {
00146        if (!m_defaultColorShemaPtr.IsValid()){
00147               m_defaultColorShemaPtr.SetPtr(new iview::CColorShema, true);
00148        }
00149 
00150        return *m_defaultColorShemaPtr;
00151 }

00156 template <class Base>
00157 TViewImpl<Base>::TViewImpl()
00158 {
00159        m_lastClientArea.Reset();
00160        m_isBackgroundBufferActive = true;
00161        m_isDoubleBufferActive = true;
00162 }

00165 // protected methods
00166 
00167 template <class Base>
00168 void TViewImpl<Base>::DrawBuffers(QPaintDevice& nativeContext, const i2d::CRect& clipRect)
00169 {
00170        CheckResize();
00171 
00172        if (!m_lastClientArea.IsEmpty()){
00173               i2d::CRect invalidatedBox = GetInvalidatedBox();
00174               invalidatedBox.Intersection(m_lastClientArea);
00175 
00176               if (IsDoubleBufferActive()){
00177                      iview::CDrawBuffer& doubleBuffer = GetDoubleBuffer();
00178                      if (!invalidatedBox.IsEmpty()){
00179                             if (!doubleBuffer.IsCreated()){
00180                                    doubleBuffer.Create(nativeContext, m_lastClientArea.GetSize());
00181                             }
00182 
00183                             QPainter& doubleBufferDC = doubleBuffer.GetDrawContext();
00184 
00185                             DrawToContext(nativeContext, doubleBufferDC, invalidatedBox);
00186                      }
00187                      doubleBuffer.CopyRectTo(clipRect, nativeContext, clipRect.GetLeftTop());
00188               }
00189               else{
00190                      QPainter canvasDC(&nativeContext);
00191                      invalidatedBox.Union(clipRect);
00192 
00193                      DrawToContext(nativeContext, canvasDC, invalidatedBox);
00194               }
00195 
00196               ResetInvalidatedBox();
00197        }
00198 }
00199 
00200 
00201 template <class Base>
00202 void TViewImpl<Base>::DrawToContext(
00203                      QPaintDevice& nativeContext,
00204                      QPainter& context,
00205                      const i2d::CRect& invalidatedBox)
00206 {
00207        I_ASSERT(!invalidatedBox.IsEmpty());
00208        // TODO: Implement drawing without background buffer
00209 
00210        iview::CDrawBuffer& backgroundBuffer = GetBackgroundBuffer();
00211        if (!backgroundBuffer.IsCreated()){
00212               backgroundBuffer.Create(nativeContext, m_lastClientArea.GetSize());
00213        }
00214 
00215        QPainter& backgroundDC = backgroundBuffer.GetDrawContext();
00216        const iview::IColorShema& colorShema =  GetDefaultColorShema();
00217 
00218        context.setPen(colorShema.GetPen(iview::IColorShema::SP_NORMAL));
00219        context.setBrush(colorShema.GetBrush(iview::IColorShema::SB_NORMAL));
00220        context.setFont(colorShema.GetFont(iview::IColorShema::SF_NORMAL));
00221 
00222        int lastBkLayerIndex = GetLastBkLayerIndex();
00223        int layersCount = GetLayersCount();
00224 
00225        bool isBackgroundBufferValid = IsBackgroundBufferValid();
00226        if (!isBackgroundBufferValid){
00227               backgroundDC.setBrush(colorShema.GetBrush(iview::IColorShema::SB_BACKGROUND));
00228               backgroundDC.setClipRegion(iqt::GetQRect(m_lastClientArea));
00229               backgroundDC.fillRect(iqt::GetQRect(m_lastClientArea), colorShema.GetBrush(iview::IColorShema::SB_BACKGROUND));
00230 
00231               if ((lastBkLayerIndex >= 0) && (lastBkLayerIndex < layersCount)){
00232                      backgroundDC.setPen(colorShema.GetPen(iview::IColorShema::SP_NORMAL));
00233                      backgroundDC.setBrush(colorShema.GetBrush(iview::IColorShema::SB_BACKGROUND));
00234                      backgroundDC.setFont(colorShema.GetFont(iview::IColorShema::SF_NORMAL));
00235 
00236                      DrawLayers(backgroundDC, 0, lastBkLayerIndex);
00237               }
00238 
00239               SetBackgroundBufferValid();
00240        }
00241 
00242        context.setClipRegion(iqt::GetQRect(invalidatedBox));
00243        backgroundBuffer.CopyRectTo(invalidatedBox, context, invalidatedBox.GetLeftTop());
00244 
00245        I_ASSERT(lastBkLayerIndex >= -1);
00246        if (lastBkLayerIndex + 1 < layersCount){
00247               DrawLayers(context, lastBkLayerIndex + 1, layersCount - 1);
00248        }
00249 }

00252 // events
00253 
00254 template <class Base>
00255 void TViewImpl<Base>::OnResize()
00256 {
00257        SetBackgroundBufferValid(false);
00258        InvalidateBox(m_lastClientArea);
00259 
00260        iview::CDrawBuffer& backgroundBuffer = GetBackgroundBuffer();
00261        if (backgroundBuffer.IsCreated()){
00262               backgroundBuffer.Reset();
00263        }
00264        iview::CDrawBuffer& doubleBuffer = GetDoubleBuffer();
00265        if (doubleBuffer.IsCreated()){
00266               doubleBuffer.Reset();
00267        }
00268 }
00269 
00270 
00271 template <class Base>
00272 void TViewImpl<Base>::CheckResize()
00273 {
00274        i2d::CRect clientArea = GetClientRect();
00275 
00276        if (m_lastClientArea != clientArea){
00277               m_lastClientArea = clientArea;
00278               InvalidateBox(clientArea);
00279 
00280               OnResize();
00281        }
00282 }
